Collector icon is an item worn in the jaw slot, a back-end Worn Equipment slot system where facial hair is placed[1] while playing Barbarian Assault. It shows that the player is a collector indicated by the yellow circle around them with the collector symbol. When a game of Barbarian Assault finishes, the icon is removed.

Having a higher level in the Collector role, which can be done via Commander Connad or choosing to do so immediately after a game, allows the collection bag to hold more eggs, and an increased chance of success when converting eggs.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
30 May 2019
(update | poll)
  • The Barbarian Assault role icons are now equipped in the jaw slot instead of the cape slot, allowing players to wear capes within games. As a result, the item is no longer visible in the Worn Equipment interface.
  • The "Wear" option was renamed to "Equip".
  • The item was made usable by free-to-play players, although it cannot be obtained by them.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • As items in the jaw slot remove existing facial hair from the player's model, a fake beard is built into the equipped model to appear as if it was never removed[2]. Thus, the collector icon has 16 different equipped models, one for each facial hairstyle that currently exists.[3]

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ↑ Mod Wolf. "Poll 67 Updates and Hosidius Improvements." 30 May 2019. Reddit Forums.
  2. ↑ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 30 May 2019. (Archived from the original on 6 June 2019.) Mod Ash: "This deletes your beard if you have one, so the [Barbarian Assault] icons have fake beards built into them so that your appearance doesn't change."
  3. ↑ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 30 May 2019. (Archived from the original on 6 June 2019.) Mod Ash: "[A jaw slot item] actually does replace your beard - so the 4 [Barbarian Assault] icons now have multiple alternate versions, one for each beard style, so that the model is of icon+beard."

[[File:Collector icon detail.png|left|130px]]
'''Collector icon''' is an item worn in the jaw slot, a back-end [[Worn Equipment]] slot system where facial hair is placed{{CiteForum|author = Mod Wolf|url = https://archive.fo/X9ifv|title = Poll 67 Updates and Hosidius Improvements|forum = Reddit|postdate = 30 May 2019}} while playing [[Barbarian Assault]]. It shows that the player is a collector indicated by the yellow circle around them with the collector symbol. When a game of Barbarian Assault finishes, the icon is removed.

Having a higher level in the Collector role, which can be done via [[Commander Connad]] or choosing to do so immediately after a game, allows the [[collection bag]] to hold more eggs, and an increased chance of success when converting eggs.

==Changes==
{{Subject changes header}}
{{Subject changes
|date = 30 May 2019
|update = Poll 67 Updates and Hosidius Improvements
|poll = Old School Content Poll 67: Small Old Content Changes
|change = *The Barbarian Assault role icons are now equipped in the jaw slot instead of the cape slot, allowing players to wear capes within games. As a result, the item is no longer visible in the [[Worn Equipment]] interface.
*The "Wear" option was renamed to "Equip".
*The item was made usable by free-to-play players, although it cannot be obtained by them.
}}
{{Subject changes footer}}

==Trivia==
*As items in the jaw slot remove existing facial hair from the player's model, a fake beard is built into the equipped model to appear as if it was never removed{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/1134035660447330304|date=30 May 2019|archiveurl=https://archive.fo/jzRA8|archivedate=6 June 2019|quote=This deletes your beard if you have one, so the [Barbarian Assault] icons have fake beards built into them so that your appearance doesn't change.}}. Thus, the collector icon has 16 different equipped models, one for each facial [[hairstyle]] that currently exists.{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/1134141975995781120|date=30 May 2019|archiveurl=https://archive.vn/7FnBw|archivedate=6 June 2019|quote=[A jaw slot item] actually does replace your beard - so the 4 [Barbarian Assault] icons now have multiple alternate versions, one for each beard style, so that the model is of icon+beard.}}
